track_info.track_genre: 春节是中国的新年。它是在一月份或者二月份。很多孩子跟他们的父母一起回到家乡。他们去看望他们的祖父母。他们与堂表兄弟姐妹一起玩耍。他们通常会收到来自他们父母、祖父母、叔叔和阿姨的压岁钱。他们在寒假会过得很开心。
track_info.track_text: The Spring festival is Chinese New Year. It is in January or February. Many children go back to their hometown with their parents. They go to see their grandparents. They play with their cousins. Very often. They get New Year's money from their parents, grandparents, aunts and uncles. They have a good time in winter vacation.
One. The Spring festival is in February.

track_info.track_genre: 2.所有人都会回到家乡过春节。
track_info.track_text: Two people all go back to their hometown for the spring festival.

track_info.track_genre: 3.孩子们过春节时会收到压岁钱。
track_info.track_text: Number three. Children get New Year's money at the spring festival.

track_info.track_genre: 我是一个小雪人，又矮又胖。这是我的扫帚柄，这是我的帽子。当欢乐的阳光出来时，我就会慢慢地融化掉。

track_info.track_genre: 五月的第二个星期日是母亲节。在这一天，孩子们想要感谢他们的母亲。他们通常送花、贺卡或糖果给他们的母亲。很多人不想让他们的母亲做晚餐。他们会去饭店吃晚餐。饭店在这天是忙碌的一天。
track_info.track_text: The second Sunday of May is Mother's Day. On this day, children want to thank their mothers. They usually give flowers, cards or candy to their mothers. Many people do not want their mothers to cook dinner. They have dinner at the restaurant. This is a busy day for restaurants.
Number one. Mother's day comes in may.

track_info.track_genre: 2. 很多家庭在这天不吃晚餐。

track_info.track_text: Mother. Mother, here are my gifts. A loving hug and a big kiss. You always love me. Even when I'm bad. You always love me and never leave me sad. Mother. Hi, Tom. What does your father do? He is a farmer. What does your mother do? She is a farmer too. My family has a big farm. Number one, are there any cows on the farm? No, there aren't. Two, Are there any chickens on the farm? Yes, there are many chickens. Number three, Are there any ducks on the farm? No, it's a chicken farm. Number four, do you grow corn on the farm? Yes, we do. Number five, do you grow potatoes? No, we don't.

track_info.track_genre: 第七单元 去中学参观
track_info.track_text: Unit 7. A visit to a middle school.

track_info.track_genre: 嗨，男孩女孩们！欢迎来到阳光中学。我是布朗.爱丽丝。我将带你们参观我们的学校。
track_info.track_text: Hi, boys and girls. Welcome to Sunlight Middle School. I'm Alice Brown. I'll show you around our school.

track_info.track_genre: 这是我们的教学楼。我们学校的图书馆在第一层。教师的办公室在第二层。
track_info.track_text: This is our classroom building. Our school library is on the first floor. Teachers offices are on the second floor.

track_info.track_genre: 布朗老师，打扰一下。我们将会在中学学习物理。实验室在哪呢？
track_info.track_text: Excuse me, Ms. Brown. We'll study physics at middle school. Where are the labs?

track_info.track_genre: 实验室在第九层。请走这边。
track_info.track_text: They are on the ninth floor. This way please.
Where are the reading rooms? They are on the first floor.
Where are the teachers offices? They are on the second floor.
Where are the classrooms for grade seven? They are on the third floor.
Where are the classrooms for grade eight? They are on the fourth floor.
Where are the classrooms for grade nine? They are on the fifth floor.
Where are the classrooms for grade 10? They are on the sixth floor.
Where are the classrooms for grade 11? They are on the seventh floor.
Where are the classrooms for grade 12? They are on the eighth floor.
Where are the science labs? They are on the ninth floor.
Where are the computer rooms? They are on the 10th floor.
3 Listen and learn the English sounds.
O o I o o I.

track_info.track_genre: 这是化学实验室。你们很快就要学习化学了。
track_info.track_text: This is a lab for chemistry. You'll learn chemistry soon.

track_info.track_genre: 哇，这么多的瓶子！化学一定非常有趣。
track_info.track_text: Wow. So many bottles. Chemistry must be very interesting.
This is a lab for physics.

track_info.track_genre: 图片上的那个男人是谁呢？
track_info.track_text: Who's the man on the picture?

track_info.track_genre: 那是爱迪生，一个伟大的发明家.
物理将会是我最喜欢的科目。我想成为像爱迪生那样的科学家。
track_info.track_text: Physics will be my favorite subject. I want to be a scientist like Edison.

track_info.track_genre: 真是一个很远大的梦想！

track_info.track_text: You'll learn physics soon. Physics will be my favorite subject.
You'll learn chemistry soon. Chemistry will be my favorite subject.
You'll learn history soon. History will be my favorite subject.
You'll learn geography soon. Geography will be my favorite subject.

track_info.track_genre: 我们今天下午参观了阳光中学。布朗老师带我们参观了教学楼。实验室在第九层。在实验室里我们看到了爱迪生的照片。他是一名伟大的发明家。很多学生想要成为爱迪生那样的发明家。
track_info.track_text: We visited Sunlight Middle school this afternoon. Ms. Brown took us to see the classroom building. The labs are on the ninth floor. In the lab, we saw a picture of Edison. He is a great inventor. Many students want to be inventors like Edison.

track_info.track_genre: 1. 我们昨天去参观了阳光中学。
track_info.track_text: Number one. We went to see Sunlight Middle School yesterday.

track_info.track_genre: 2. 高老师带我们参观了实验室。
track_info.track_text: Two. Ms. Gao took us to see the labs.

track_info.track_genre: 3. 很多同学梦想成为发明家。
track_info.track_text: Number three. Many students dream to be inventors.

track_info.track_genre: 我们学校将会闪闪发光
我们学校今天将会闪闪发光。 我们学校将会闪闪发光。所有都照成一条线。我们学校将会闪闪发光。当太阳落山，当月亮升起，我们学校将会闪闪发光。
track_info.track_text: Our school will shine today Our school will shine Our school will shine today all down the line Our school will shine today Our school will shine when the sun goes down when the moon goes up Our school will shine Our skill will shine today Our skill will shine Our school will shine today all down the line Our school will shine day Our school will shine when the sun goes down when the R comes down Our school will shine Our school will shine today Will shine I still will shine I will shine when the sun goes out when the moon comes out I still will shine.

track_info.track_genre: 地理充满了乐趣！ 在地图上，我可以找到一个又一个国家。
track_info.track_text: Geography is lots of fun on the map I can look for countries one by one Geography is lots of fun on the map and look for countries one by one Geography is lots of fun on the map and look for countries one by one.

Number one, this is a wonderful playground. We can play football here. Number two, where are the labs for chemistry? They are on the ninth floor. Number three, where are the labs for physics? They are on the ninth floor too. Number four, where are the teachers offices? They are on the second floor.

track_info.track_genre: 莎莉将要去美国念中学了。我们想举行一个聚会跟她告别。我们能做些什么呢？
track_info.track_text: Sally will go to a middle school in the usa. We'll have a party to say goodbye to her. What can we do?

track_info.track_genre: 噢，我会想她的。让我们全班同学合影吧。
track_info.track_text: Oh, I'll miss her. Let's take some photos of our class.

track_info.track_genre: 那么我可以为我们班级同学制作一部DVD。
track_info.track_text: Then I can make a dvd for our class.

track_info.track_genre: 为什么不做一本纪念册呢？我们在纪念册上写上我们的姓名地址和电话号码。
track_info.track_text: Why not make a yearbook? We can put our names, addresses and phone numbers in the book.

track_info.track_genre: 而且我们可以邀请她的父母参加聚会。
track_info.track_text: And we can invite her parents to the party.

track_info.track_genre: 为什么不制作一本纪念册呢？
为什么不邀请她的父母参加聚会呢？
track_info.track_text: Why not invite her parents to the party?

track_info.track_genre: 为什么不拍一些班级同学的照片呢？
track_info.track_text: Why not take some photos of our class?

track_info.track_genre: 为什么不制作一部我们班级同学的DVD呢？
track_info.track_text: Why not make a dvd for our class?
3 Listen and learn the English sounds.

track_info.track_genre: 这是我们班级同学的纪念册。你可以从上面找到我们的信息。
track_info.track_text: Here's a yearbook of our class. You can find our information from it.

track_info.track_genre: 我制作了一部DVD。让我们一起观看。你记得这张照片吗？
track_info.track_text: I made a dvd. Let's watch it together. Do you remember this photo?

track_info.track_genre: 那是我的生日聚会。你们送给我一只兔子。
track_info.track_text: That was my birthday party. You gave me a rabbit.

track_info.track_genre: 你记得这次晚餐吗？这是去年的感恩节晚餐。我们度过了一段快乐的时光。
track_info.track_text: Do you remember this dinner? It was Thanksgiving dinner last year. We had a very good time.
Do you remember this photo? It was Sally's birthday party. We gave her a rabbit.
Do you remember this photo? We went for a spring outing last year. Ms. Gao took this photo of us.
Do you remember this photo? It was Teachers Day. Peter took this photo of them.
Do you remember this photo? It was Thanksgiving dinner last year. We had a very good time.

track_info.track_genre: 我的父母将要回美国了。我要去那里的中学读书。离开中国我感觉很悲伤。我会想我的同学。今天我得到了一本班级同学的纪念册。我能在纪念册上找到我朋友的信息。我将会给我的老师发邮件，并且通过电话跟他们聊天。
track_info.track_text: My parents will go back to the usa. I will go to a middle school there. I feel sorry to leave China. I'll miss my classmates. Today I got a yearbook of my class. I can find the information of my friends from it. I will send emails to my teachers and classmates and talk with them on the phone.

track_info.track_genre: 1.莎莉将要离开中国。 她感觉悲伤。
track_info.track_text: Number one. Sally will leave China. She feels sad.

track_info.track_genre: 2. 她可以从纪念册上找到朋友们的电话号码。
track_info.track_text: Number two. She can find her friend's phone numbers from the yearbook.

track_info.track_genre: 3. 她将会给同学和老师打电话。
track_info.track_text: Number three. She will call her classmates and teachers.

Here are your phone numbers I call you all Open my yearbook and have a close look oh Lily Julia Wontal I miss you all. Here are your phone numbers I hold you all.

Number two. Will you go by plane? Yes, by plane.
Number three. Will you fly from Beijing? No, I will fly from Shanghai.
Number four. Please take some photos of your new school in the usa. Sure. And I will send them to you by email. Thank you.

Unit 6. Do you want to be a nurse? Yes, I do. Do you want to be a teacher? Yes, I do. Do you want to be a taxi driver? Yes, I do. Do you want to be a singer? Yes, I do. Will you be a math teacher? No, I won't. Will you be a PE Teacher? Yes, I Will you be a PE Teacher? No, I won't. Will you be a doctor? Yes, I will.

Unit 7. Where are the reading rooms? They are on the first floor. Where are the teachers offices? They are on the second floor. Where are the science labs? They are on the ninth floor. Where are the computer rooms? They are on the 10th floor. You will learn physics at middle school. Physics will be my favorite subject. You will learn chemistry at middle school. Chemistry will be my favorite subject. You will learn history at middle school. History will be my favorite subject. You will learn geography at middle school. Geography will be my favorite subject.

Unit 8. Why not make a yearbook? Why not invite her parents to the party? Why not take some photos of our class? Why not make a DVD for our class? Do you remember this photo? It was Sally's birthday party. We gave her a rabbit. Do you remember this photo? We went for a spring outing last year. Ms. Gao took this photo of us.

track_info.track_genre: 我爱我的班级。我们在一起过得很开心。去年我们出去春游。我们攀登了一座高山。在山顶上，高老师为我们拍了这张照片。
track_info.track_text: I love my class. We had a wonderful time together. Last year we went for a spring outing. We climbed a mountain. At the top of the mountain, Ms. Gao took this photo of us.

track_info.track_genre: 我的同学都很友好。他们互相帮助。王涛三月份摔伤了他的腿。我们去医院看他。他担心他的功课。我和彼得帮助他补习英语。杨明帮助他补习数学。李莉帮助他补习语文。现在他能够跟上我们的进度了。
track_info.track_text: My classmates are very nice. They help each other. Wong Tao broke his leg in March we went to hospital to see him. He was worried about his lessons. Peter and I helped him with his English Yongming helped him with his Math Lily helped him with his Chinese. Now he can keep up with us.

track_info.track_genre: 我将要去纽约念中学了。我将会离开中国。我感觉很难过。我爱我的老师。我爱我的班级同学。我会给我中国的朋友打电话。我会通过电子邮件给他们发送照片。
track_info.track_text: I will go to a middle school in New York. I will leave China. I feel sad. I love my teachers. I love my class. I will call my friends in China. I will send them photos by email.
Number one. Sally loves her class.
Number two, Sally will go to the usa.
Number three. Sally is worried about her lessons.
5 Listen and learn the English sounds.
I g h I g h.
The old man and the goldfish.

track_info.track_genre: 一个贫穷的渔民和他的妻子住在一座小房子里。一天，他去海里钓鱼。
track_info.track_text: A poor fisherman and his wife lived in a small house. One day he went fishing in the sea.

track_info.track_genre: 很快，他钓上一条金鱼。“噢，请放过我吧，”金鱼说，“当你有什么需要的时候我会过来帮助你的。”
track_info.track_text: Soon he pulled up a goldfish. Oh, please let me go. The goldfish said, I'll come to help you when you need anything.

track_info.track_genre: 那个老人很善良。他把金鱼放回大海了。
track_info.track_text: The old man was very kind. He put the fish back into the sea.

track_info.track_genre: 他告诉他的妻子关于那条鱼的事。“我们的洗衣盆很旧了，为什么不要一个新的呢？”他妻子喊道
track_info.track_text: He told his wife about the fish. Our washtub is very old. Why not ask for a new one? His wife cried. What?

track_info.track_genre: “我可以为你做什么呢？”金鱼问道。“我妻子想要一个新的洗衣盆，”老人说道。
track_info.track_text: Can I do for you? The fish asked. My wife wants a new washtub, said the old man.

track_info.track_genre: 现在他的妻子得到了一个新的洗衣盆，但是她仍不高兴。她想要一座新的房子。
track_info.track_text: Now. His wife got a new washtub. But she was not happy. She wanted a new house.

track_info.track_genre: 然后，他的妻子得到了一座新房子，但是她还不高兴。她想要一座宫殿和新衣服。
track_info.track_text: Then his wife got a new house. But she was not happy. She wanted a palace and new clothes.

track_info.track_genre: “这次你想要什么呢？”金鱼问。“我的妻子想要一座宫殿和新衣服。”
track_info.track_text: What do you want this time? The fish asked. My wife wants a palace and new clothes.

track_info.track_genre: 老人回家了。现在他的家是一座漂亮的宫殿，但是他的妻子不开心。
track_info.track_text: The old man got home. Now his home was a beautiful palace. But his wife was not happy.

track_info.track_genre: “我想要成为大海的女王。我想要那条金鱼来做我的仆人，”他的妻子大喊道。
track_info.track_text: I want to be the queen of the sea. I want the goldfish to be my servant. His wife shouted.

track_info.track_genre: 老人去到海边，但是金鱼这次什么都没给他。
track_info.track_text: The old man went to the seaside. But this time the goldfish didn't give him anything.

track_info.track_genre: 老人回到家中。宫殿已经不在了。他们又变穷了。
track_info.track_text: The old man went home. The palace was not there. They were poor again.
